Articles.Content: Anyone know if there's a control for resource transfer on consoles, I've looked at all the control menus and can't find anything, I can replace that function with fuel ducts for now but I'm constructing a space station and will need to know how to resource transfer once it's finished

If you open the context menus of the fuel tanks -- and ONLY the fuel tanks -- and you have your R&D building upgraded to Tier 2, then the In/Out resource transfer buttons should appear automatically in the context menus.

16 hours ago, bewing said:

If you open the context menus of the fuel tanks -- and ONLY the fuel tanks -- and you have your R&D building upgraded to Tier 2, then the In/Out resource transfer buttons should appear automatically in the context menus.

 

But how do I select multiple context menus?

Ummmm. Great question. There are two possible ways to do it on a PC.

The first is: open the first context menu. In the upper right is a little dot that allows you to "pin" that context menu open permanently. Click that. Then click on the next fuel tank, and pin its context menu open the same way. Once you have one pinned, it will let you open another one.

The second method is: on a PC, you hold down ALT while you are clicking open all the additional context menus. So I will take a bunch of guesses, and one of them will probably be right!  It's either going to be the right bumper or the left bumper or the right trigger or the left trigger or clicking down one of your thumb sticks or the hat. ....
